title: Week In Politics: Karl Rove, Eric Shinseki And A Slew Of Primaries
teaser: Regular political commentators, E.J. Dionne of The Washington Post and David Brooks of The New York Times, discuss the kerfuffle over Karl Rove's remarks on Hillary Clinton's health, the upcoming primaries in six states, the death of Watergate conspirator Jeb Magruder and the continuing tensions surrounding Veterans Affairs Secretary Eric Shinseki.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
